dsOverview.title: ERA-15 Supplementary Flux Accumulation Fields

summary.p: Supplementary flux accumulation fields from the ECMWF 15 year Reanalysis Project (ERA-15) forecast data.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Computational and Information Systems Laboratory, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: ECMWF > European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts

access.p: Must be a registered RDA user and have agreed to the Terms of Use for ECMWF Data (Other Than Operational Data). Register or sign in on the web page. Once signed in manage your agreements from the dashboard under User Profile.
